wikipedia_page.main: Edwin Taylor, JP (13 February 1905 – 25 September 1973) was a British master baker and politician from Bolton.

response: |16 November 1960Edwin Taylor retained the seat for the Conservatives in the by-election but lost it to Labour in the 1964 UK general election.

The Bolton East by-election, 1960 was a by-election held for the British House of Commons constituency of Bolton East in Lancashire on 16 November 1960. It was won by the Conservative Party candidate Edwin Taylor.
* Edwin Taylor (British politician) (1905–1973), British master baker and politician from Bolton
* Edwin Taylor (treasurer), colonial treasurer of Hong Kong, 1931–1937
